channel.title: InYourBones Daily Music News
channel.description: Top 5 daily music stories handpicked by InYourBones

item.title: Sly & the Family Stone to Release Earliest Known Live Recording of Legendary Funk Band
item.description: 🕺 Get ready to groove! Sly & the Family Stone are dropping an electrifying live recording 🔥 #FunkLegends #NewMusicAlert

item.title: Disclosure Announce Fall 2025 North American Tour
item.description: 🎉 Ready to dance? @Disclosure is hitting the road in 2025! Prepare for beats and vibes across North America! 🌟 #DisclosureTour2025

item.title: Purity Ring – “many lives” & “part ii”
item.description: ✨ Dive into dreamy new sounds with @PURITY_RING's “many lives” & “part ii”! 🎶 #NewMusicAlert #PurityRing

item.title: Bush Unleash “The Land of Milk and Honey,” First Official Single from Upcoming Album: Stream
item.description: 🎶 Dive into the lush sounds of Bush's new single "The Land of Milk and Honey"! Stream it now for a taste of what's to come! 🌟 #Bush #NewMusicAlert

item.title: Talking Heads celebrate 50th anniversary with new “Psycho Killer” video starring Saoirse Ronan
item.description: 🎉 Talking Heads party like it's 1977 in new “Psycho Killer” video ft. Saoirse Ronan! Let's dance! 💃 #TalkingHeads50 #PsychoKillerRevival

item.title: Ethel Cain Says She Hunted Down Synths From the ‘Twin Peaks’ Soundtrack to Make ‘Nettles’
item.description: 🎶 Dive into the dreamy world of Ethel Cain as she weaves synths from 'Twin Peaks' into her new track 'Nettles'! 🌟 #MusicMagic

item.title: Gordi – “PVC Divide” (Feat. Anaïs Mitchell)
item.description: 🎶 Fresh collab alert! 🚀 Dive into the magical world of Gordi and Anaïs Mitchell with their latest track "PVC Divide"! ✨ #NewMusicFriday 🎧

item.title: Frankie Cosmos – “Pressed Flower”
item.description: 🌸 Dive into the dreamy new sounds of Frankie Cosmos with the enchanting track "Pressed Flower" 🎶 #NewMusicAlert 🌟

item.title: The Starting Line announce first album in 18 years, share “Sense of Humor”
item.description: 🎉 The Starting Line is back with new music after 18 years! 🎶 Get ready to groove to "Sense of Humor"! 🔥 #TheStartingLine #NewMusicAlert

item.title: King Princess announces new LP & tour, shares “RIP KP”
item.description: 👑 Get ready to catch the royal vibes! King Princess is dropping a new LP & hitting the road! 🎶 #KingPrincess #RIPKP

item.title: Jessie J Reveals ‘Early Breast Cancer’ Diagnosis: ‘Cancer Sucks in Any Form’
item.description: Sending love and strength to Jessie J as she bravely opens up about her early breast cancer diagnosis 💕 Let's show our support! #StayStrongJessieJ 🎵

item.title: ALYA Creates a New Soundtrack For The Holiday Season
item.description: Spreading joy with ALYA's festive beats 🎶✨ Get ready to jingle all the way! #HolidaySoundtrack

item.title: Noah Kahan Documentary to Trace His Rise to Stardom
item.description: 🌟 Dive into @NoahKahan's journey from small town to stardom! 🎶 Exciting documentary coming soon! #NoahKahan #MusicJourney 🎥🎤

item.title: Drake and PartyNextDoor Announce Summer 2025 Tour
item.description: 🔥🎶 Let's heat up the summer with Drake and PartyNextDoor hitting the road together in 2025! Who's ready to vibe? 🔥🚗 #SummerTourSzn

item.title: Shame Announce New Album, Share Video for New Song “Cutthroat”: Watch
item.description: 🔥 Exciting news alert! 🎶 Shame are back with a new album and killer track “Cutthroat”! 🎸 Watch the music video now! #NewMusicAlert 🚀

item.title: Finneas, Ashe Announce New Band, The Favors, and Debut Album
item.description: 🎸 New music alert! 🎶 Finneas and Ashe team up as The Favors for a hot debut album drop! 🔥 Who's ready to jam? 🎉 #TheFavors #MusicNews

item.title: Rick Astley’s “Never Gonna Give You Up” Rickrolls Past 1 Billion Spotify Streams
item.description: 🎉 Rick Astley just Rickrolled past 1 billion Spotify streams! 🕺🎶 Who's ready to sing along? #NeverGonnaGiveYouUp #RickAstley

item.title: Tears for Fears Add New Dates to Las Vegas Residency
item.description: 🎉 Las Vegas just got even more fabulous! @tearsforfears have added more dates to their residency! Who's ready for an unforgettable night? 💃🎶 #TearsForFears #LasVegasResidency

item.title: Superchunk Announce New Album, Share New Song: Listen
item.description: 🎸 Pump up the volume! Superchunk is back with a brand-new album and a killer new track! 🎶 #rockout #newmusicalert

item.title: Nandi Bushell Performs Radiohead’s “Everything in Its Right Place” on Drums, Piano, and Vocals: Watch
item.description: 🥁🎹 Nandi Bushell impresses with her multi-instrumental talent on Radiohead's "Everything in Its Right Place"! 🌟 Watch her bring the magic! 🎶 #MusicMonday

item.title: James Lowe, Singer in Psych-Rock Band the Electric Prunes, Dies at 82
item.description: RIP to James Lowe of the Electric Prunes 🎸🌟 Let's blast their tunes in his honor! #MusicLegend #ElectricPrunesForever

item.title: Watch Lady Gaga Perform “Zombieboy” and “Abracadabra” at Netflix Tudum 2025
item.description: ✨🎤 Lady Gaga slaying with new tracks at Netflix Tudum 2025! 🌟 Which performance gave you chills? #LadyGaga #Tudum2025 🎶✨

item.title: Dolly Parton Turned Down Being a Judge on American Idol: “I Just Can’t Hurt People”
item.description: Dolly Parton spreading love, not judgment! 💖🎶 Who needs American Idol when we've got the queen of country? #SpreadLoveNotJudgment

item.title: Oasis Launches New Merch Collection on Amazon
item.description: 🌟 Rock on with Oasis' cool new merch drop on Amazon! 🎸 Grab your favorite band swag now! 🛍️ #Oasis #MerchDrop #RocknRoll

item.title: Watch Toyah & Robert Fripp revisit AC/DC’s “Back in Black”
item.description: Rock legends Toyah & Robert Fripp bring the 🔥 with their killer cover of AC/DC's "Back in Black"! 🎸🎶 #RockOn #MusicLegends

item.title: Lady Gaga’s ‘Wednesday’ Character Confirmed, First Six Minutes of Season Two Released
item.description: 🎶 Get ready to dive back into the world of Lady Gaga's 'Wednesday'! 🌟 Season Two's first six minutes are here! 💥 #LadyGaga #WednesdaySeries

item.title: Miley Cyrus Talks Pop Star Peers, ‘Winding Down’ Her Focus on Mainstream Success After ‘Something Beautiful’
item.description: Just spilling the tea with Miley 🍵 Who else is ready for her next chapter? 👀💫 #MileyCyrus #NewMusicWhoDis
